Package io.micronaut.http.ssl

Class DefaultSslConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.ssl.SslConfiguration
io.micronaut.http.ssl.DefaultSslConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Toggleable
@ConfigurationProperties("micronaut.ssl") @Primary public class DefaultSslConfiguration extends SslConfiguration
The default SslConfiguration configuration used if no other configuration is specified.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
